get.summary: New - Retrieves information about the specified admin user.
get.description: Performs necessary checks and get all the information of the Admin based on admin udid.

400.description: 1. { 400: User not found or does not have access to retrieve the details }

404.description: 1. { 404: Requested admin was not found or user is not authorized to access it.}

put.summary: New - Updates the specified admin user.
put.description: Performs necessary checks and Update the Admin properties based on Id.

400.description: 1. { 400: User not found or does not have access to retrieve the details }1. { 400: UserName already exists. }2. { 400: Email Address is not valid. }3. { 400: Location Group {OGId} not found or user does not have access to it }4. { 400: LocationGroupId {OGId} is not valid }

404.description: 1. { 404: Requested admin was not found or user is not authorized to access it.}

delete.summary: New - Deletes the specified admin user.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Admin user UUID to be deleted(Required)

400.description: 1. { 400: Requested 'admin' was not found or user is not authorized to access it }

post.summary: New - Creates a new admin user.
post.description: Performs necessary checks and Create a new Admin.

parameters.name: admin
parameters.description: The admin user resource to create (Required)

400.description: 1. { 400: UserName already exists. }2. { 400: Email Address is not valid. }3. { 400: Location Group {OGId} not found or user does not have access to it }4. { 400: LocationGroupId {OGId} is not valid }5. { 400: UserName cannot be null or empty. }6. { 400: User Not Found in Directory }7. { 400: Admin User should be associated with atleast one role, please add role to the user. }8. { 400: The TimeZone value : {TimeZoneId} is invalid. }9. { 400: Invalid Locale name. }10. { 400: Duplicate role mapping is found between Location Group id {OGId} and Role id {RoleId} }

get.summary: New - Searches for Admin users using the query information provided.
get.description: Performs necessary checks and search for the admin users based on the request query.

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: The First name to search for.

parameters.name: lastname
parameters.description: The Last name to search for.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The Email Address to search for.

parameters.name: organizationgroupid
parameters.description: The Organization Group Id to search for.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The Role name to search for.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The User name to search for.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Order the results by this attribute.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The specific page number to get.

parameters.name: sortorder
parameters.description: Sorting order. Allowed values are ASC or DESC. Defaults to ASC if this attribute is not specified.

400.description: 1. { 400: Resource's organization group :{OGId} not found or user does not have access to this organization group. }

put.summary: New - Changes the specified admin user's password.
put.description: Performs necessary checks and update the password for an existing admin.

400.description: 1. { 400: User not found or does not have access to retrieve the details }2. { 400: Password cannot be null, empty, or whitespace }3. { 400: Password does not meet complexity requirements }

401.description: 1. { 401: LDAP / AD users passwords cannot be changed }

404.description: 1. { 404: Requested admin was not found or user is not authorized to access it.}

put.summary: New - Adds a role to the specified admin user.
put.description: Performs necessary checks and add an role for an existing admin.

400.description: 1. { 400: User not found or does not have access to retrieve the details }2. { 400: Role {RoleId} not found or user does not have access to it }3. { 400: Location Group {OGId} not found or user does not have access to it }4. { 400: Admin user already has this role.

404.description: 1. { 404: Requested admin was not found or user is not authorized to access it.}

delete.summary: New - Removes a role from the specified admin user.
delete.description: Performs necessary checks and remove an role from an existing admin.

400.description: 1. { 400: User not found or does not have access to retrieve the details }2. { 400: Role {RoleId} not found or user does not have access to it }3. { 400: Location Group {OGId} not found or user does not have access to it }4. { 400: Role cannot be removed 5. {400: Role cannot be removed, atleast one role should be associated with the admin user {AdminId} }

404.description: 1. { 404: Requested admin was not found or user is not authorized to access it.}2. { 404: Requested admin role was not found or user is not authorized to access it. }

post.summary: Creates container device with the query infomration passed in the request

Register users and devices provided in the request
preserving the appropriate user type and the Location Group in the request
New - Creates a new Event Notification rule with events to subscribe to.

get.summary: New - Searches Event Notifications based on the query information provided.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sorts the response based on this attribute [TargetName, TargetUrl, FormatType, UserName, Active].

parameters.name: sortorder
parameters.description: Sorting order. Values ASC or DESC. Defaults to ASC..

get.summary: New - Retrieves details of an Event Notification Rule identified by EventNotification Id.

put.summary: New - Updates an Event Notification Rule identified by the Event Notification Id.

delete.summary: New - Deletes an Event Notification Rule identified by the Event Notification Id.

parameters.name: locationGroup
parameters.description: The OrganizationGroup resource to be created.

400.description: 1. {6 : Invalid Input - cannot create organization group with invalid input}

get.summary: Searches for organization groups using the query information provided.

parameters.name: groupid
parameters.description: The organization group identifier[Activation code] to search for.[Exact match is performed for this attribute]

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Orders the results based on this attribute-value[Valid values are: Id/Name/GroupId/LocationGroupType]

parameters.name: sortorder
parameters.description: Sorting order. Allowed values are ASC or DESC. Defaults to ASC if this attribute is not specified.

FileName.description: Gets or sets FileName {Will be set in the content-disposition header}

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID

email.description: Email address of the admin user

initialLandingPage.description: Initial landing page of AirWatch console

isActiveDirectoryUser.description: Flag to indicate whether the admin user is LDAP/AD user

requiresPasswordChange.description: Flag to indicate whether the admin user requires to change the password on next login

roles.description: Roles associated with the admin user

messageTemplateId.description: Gets or sets message template ID

messageTemplateUuid.description: Gets or sets message template UUID

organizationGroupId.description: Gets or sets organization group ID

organizationGroupUuid.description: Gets or sets organization group UUID

organizationGroupUuid.description: Gets or sets organization group UUID

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

TargetName.description: The Friendly name of the Target URL.

TargetUrl.description: The URL to send the event notifications to.

Username.description: The username required to access the Target URL.

Password.description: The Password required to access the Target URL.

Format.description: The format of the POST message: XML(0) or Json(1).

IsActive.description: Indicates whether event notification's have been set to active or inactive.

DeviceEvents.description: Device events that could occur for a device.

organizationGroupId.description: Gets or sets organization group ID

organizationGroupUuid.description: Gets or sets organization group UUID

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

Enrollment.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered to set the enrollment status of a device.

UnenrolledEnterpriseWipe.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered to unenroll and perform an enterpirse wipe on a device.

Wipe.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered to wipe a device.

CompromisedStatusChange.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a change in the setting of a compromised device.

Delete.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a deletion of the device.

ComplianceStatusChange.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has changed the compliance status for a device.

DeviceAttributes.description: Device attribute properties that have been changed. These properties are triggered by an outbound event call.

AssetNumber.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a device asset number.

FriendlyName.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a device friendly name.

OrganizationGroup.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has triggered a changed organization group for a device.

UserEmailAddress.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a existing user email address.

Ownership.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for ownership of a device.

OperatingSystem.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a device's operating system.

PhoneNumber.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a device's phone number.

DeviceMCC.description: Indicates whether an outbound event has been triggered for a device's MCC.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID
